creditline: Gift of David and Ruth Waterbury in celebration of the 100th anniversary of the Minneapolis Institute of Arts
description: vase with two openings made up of two interconnected elements; larger element has rounded body--slightly flattened on one side--with deep texturing on slightly flattened side and deep cracks and insect holes overall, with off-center, tilted mouth; smaller element has bulbous shape with curving mouth and two curving tendrils with are intertwined with three horizontal loops on one side of larger element; similar cracks and holes on smaller element; flower-like elements inside each vase opening; medium patina
marks:
Signature, Title, Date, Inscription and Sticker
 on underside, burned: [Michelle / Holzapfel / 2001
title: Duet Vase
